## Q1 — Five-number Summary {#q1}

The `load_time.csv` dataset consists of the monthly average website page load times (in milliseconds) over a year. 

Using the dataset `load_time.csv`, obtain the five-number summary of the variable `page_load_time` using the `summary()` function.

What is the maximum value of `reaction_time`?
```{webr}
load_data <- read.csv("load_time.csv")

```

```{webr}
#| echo: false
load_data <- read.csv("load_time.csv")
month_order <- c("Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", 
                 "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec")
load_data$month <- factor(load_data$month, levels = month_order)

```

## Q5 - Boxplot Ordered by Mean {#q5}

Hint: You may find the reorder() function and geom_boxplot() helpful.

